item.description:
Drove by it a few times, but never hung out inside.
Looks like a cozy deco'd out house.
FREE WIFI.
Live music Fri & Sat's 8pm-12am.
I don't mind donating to performers (they deserve something for putting on a show),
but there is a $5 "house cover" in addition which may prevent people on budget from coming or purchasing anything.
By Phuc

http://www.jittersclu...

www.jittersclub.com

EASY to Find: Take---I-84, to Exit 32 (Queen St), go NORTH, 1 mile on right,


(at the light, junction of Rt 177 & Rt 10)

1273 Queen St (Route 10)
Southington, CT

Music of Kenn Morr

http://www.kennmorr.c...

www.kennmorr.com/kennmorr.cfm
item.how_to_find_us: Kelly S said that she will be there so she is the CT POC.
item.name: Coffee Talk goes to Jitters Coffee House
